name: OverGift
description:
Summary :

Welcome to Overgift ! 

Your goal is simple, make as much gift commands has you can before the timer end !

Context:

Project realised during Gaming Campus gamejam (5 days) in december 2022.

The theme of the gamejam was "Christmass", and multiplayer was mandatory.

Credit :

- Leo CHABERT, Producteur & Game Dev (Gameplay /Polish / Network)

- Robin DOUET, Game Dev (SFX, Network)

- Fabien MOGADE,  Game Dev (UI, Network)

- David NGUYEN, Game Dev (Gameplay, Network)

- NIEMAZ Alban, Game Dev (UI-UX / gameplay)
